General.Name: Blueone Card Inc
General.Description: BlueOne Card, Inc. provides pay out solutions and prepaid cards to consumers in the United States. It operates as a reseller of the program manager's prepaid card that provides consumer benefits, including no overdraft fees, no interest fees, virtual bank accounts, and free direct deposits. The company was formerly known as Manneking Inc. and changed its name to BlueOne Card, Inc. in July 2020. BlueOne Card, Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Newport Beach, California.
General.Address: 4695 MacArthur Court, Newport Beach, CA, United States, 92660
